Html:
Hi there,

 

i need a litte help with a project.

i will open an existing *.xls file and edit some text fields like "A1 = test ".

After that i will give it out in the Browser as download.

So i can download the Modifyed *.xls version of the existing *.xls.

 

can any one give me an example code ?

 

Many Thanks 

Jonas
have a look at the examples directory ;)
Check out Tests/30template.php and Tests/01simple-download-xls.php -- swap the former "Write to Excel5 format" with the latter "Redirect output" code at the end.
